panel.title: Can I modify this app via the UI?

div.p: Yes. While this app can be maintained via GitHub, if you modify the app in the UI - for example, by creating a new dashboard or report - the changes will be saved locally in Splunk.
These changes can be added to the GitHub repo, but will not be overwritten by any future deployment of this app.
Any content not maintained in the GitHub repo will only be recoverable from the Search Head backups.

panel.title: How do I view the dashboards

div.p: Dashboards can be accessed via the "Dashboards" menu in the Splunk app bar.

panel.title: Who should I contact for any questions about this app?

div.p: For any question about this app, please contact the CIP Experience Team
